Bash(git -C /Users/federico/Documents/ClaudeCode/speculum commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add cache headers and gzip compression for performance

- Static assets: 1 year cache with immutable flag
- Mirror content: 1 day cache
- Screenshots/thumbnails: 1 week cache
- Video files: 1 month cache
- API GET: 1 minute cache, POST no-store
- Sitemap/robots: 1 hour cache
- RSS/Atom feeds: 15 minutes cache
- HTML pages: no-cache with Vary headers
- Add flask-compress for gzip responses

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
